Plot: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.
Title: Left Behind
Writer: Jerry B. Jenkins (based on novel), Tim LaHaye (based on novel), Paul Lalonde, John Patus
Actors: Nicolas Cage, Nicky Whelan, Chad Michael Murray, Lea Thompson
tomatoConsensus: Yea verily, like unto a plague of locusts, Left Behind hath begat a further scourge of devastation upon Nicolas Cage's once-proud filmography.
